item.title: The Black Phone 2 Gets Major Production Update & BTS Photo From Scott Derrickson
item.description: Scott Derrickson shares a new behind-the-scenes photo from The Black Phone 2, providing a major production update on the anticipated horror sequel.

item.title: Anora Interview: Mikey Madison Breaks Down Ani's Real Feelings For Ivan & That Devastating Ending
item.description: Anora star Mikey Madison discusses the critically acclaimed film, including how Ani really feels about Ivan and Igor, and that gut-punch of an ending.

item.title: Weekend In Taipei's George Huang & Sung Kang Talk Directorial Return, Working With Luc Besson & Complex Villain
item.description: Weekend in Taipei's George Huang and Sung Kang talk the former's return to directing after over 20 years, working with Luc Besson and more.
